Module com.example.sae_sisfrance
Package fr.groupeF.sae_sisfrance.controller

Class DataPageController

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
fr.groupeF.sae_sisfrance.controller.DataPageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DataPageController extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
DataPageController is a controller class that manages the functionality of the data page in the application. It handles the display and filtering of earthquake data, the menu and with the map view.
